website_summaries.verdict: A solidly made must-have birthday candle for anyone who enjoys the Caped Crusader’s many adventures.
pros: Excellently crafted likeness of classic Batman
cons: May seem a bit large on a small cake

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Perfect candle for a batman themed birthday party. Came in undamaged which is nice. We've had them come in broken in the past. Its actually bigger than i thought it would be which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Duffield

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: bought for my son's birthday he loved it so much we will be using it next year as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but definitely annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn't have the white eyes or white mouth. It's not worth returning (I fixed it myself), but definitely annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jingle3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this item, good price, good quality, fast shipping. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Elena Craciun

customer_reviews.title: Batman Candle
customer_reviews.text: The PERFECT birthday candle for the Batman junkies birthday cake!!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Davis

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the photo
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fiance's ridiculous birthday cake. Looks just like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: bekah lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i wanted! A smidge big for my cupcake! All the better (just had to prop it up a bit) kid loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: So cool
customer_reviews.text: This was really well made candle. Good finishing . Perfect for your the little Batman birthday party
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: Def better for a cake than a cupcake
customer_reviews.text: Cute candle for my son’s Batman themed party. The point at the bottom isn’t very pointy. Def better for a cake than a cupcake, but it did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Nephew loved his Batman cake and the candle on top!
customer_reviews.text: Made a batman cake for my nephew's 4th Birthday and he loved that even his candle was Batman.
customer_reviews.author: latak

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like pictured
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it was going to be messed up in the mail but it was just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Red Snow

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey for it's size, but my son liked it on his cake
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hott

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Batman figure is there just not as detailed as showen.
customer_reviews.author: george deluna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks as good as it does in the picture. Great candle, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed candle
customer_reviews.text: The candle design and color sat beautifully on our sons cake.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product I love it, fast delivery is what I love more
customer_reviews.author: carmen kay

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I expected something a little bigger for the price. I saw other batman candles in the store but I thought this one was better but it much smaller. Not worth the price. I would spend 2 bucks on it
customer_reviews.author: Sybil H.

product_meta.title: Wilton Batman Birthday Candle, Multicolor
product_meta.description: Celebrate their birthday with Batman! This black and yellow police shaped birthday candle features Batman in action. It's the perfect finishing touch for your Batman birthday party and cake.
feature_bullets: Features Batman with a yellow background
The perfect finishing touch for your themed birthday cake
